name: Arcane Ghosts
description:
THIS GAME WORKS IN IPHONE, BUT IPAD IS RECOMMENDED TO ENJOY THE BEST OF IT.
Works in iPhone 4, or newer and iPad 2, iPad Mini or newer. Older devices are not supported and iOS 8.0 and iPhones 6.0 and 6.0 plus are also not yet supported.

Huge monsters, undead deities, hidden treasures.. Arcane Ghosts is the 2D platformer, inspired by the classics. The challenge that you were waiting for.
Explore the levels, find keys, secret items, level up your character, acquire new abilities.. and beat the evil once and for all.

Take Orestes to avenge the King and his brothers. Beat the dark Necromancer!
Clean Greece from the legions of undead myths!.

Fully customizable controls!
choose your controls size, type and position. Never playing a classic arcade in your iPhone or iPad was so comfortable.

Fun, challenging and beautiful!
tons of spears to waste, and tons of monsters to be punished in this fast action arcade.
